description: This Python source file provides an implementation of an AI support agent for the Agno framework. It includes functions to initialize knowledge bases, manage sessions, create and configure an agent with specific tools and instructions, and run an interactive command-line interface for developers to ask questions and receive explanations, code examples, and guidance related to Agno.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with tools, knowledge base, and instructions to interact with developers.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Handles knowledge retrieval from URLs and integrates with a vector database for search.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using OpenAI models for similarity search.

classes.name: SqliteAgentStorage
classes.description: Manages session storage using SQLite database.

classes.name: PythonTools
classes.description: Provides Python code execution and analysis tools for the agent.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Vector database implementation using LanceDB for hybrid search.

methods.name: initialize_knowledge_base
methods.description: Initializes the knowledge base with Agno documentation URL and vector database setup.

methods.name: get_agent_storage
methods.description: Returns the session storage handler for managing agent sessions.

methods.name: create_agent
methods.description: Creates and configures an Agent instance with knowledge, tools, and instructions.

methods.name: get_example_topics
methods.description: Provides a list of example questions and topics for user interaction.

methods.name: handle_session_selection
methods.description: Handles user input to select or start a new session.

methods.name: run_interactive_loop
methods.description: Runs the main interactive loop allowing users to ask questions or select topics.

methods.name: agno_support_agent
methods.description: Main entry point to initialize and run the support agent with optional knowledge loading.
